abstract.t: Content internetworking (also referred to as content distributioninternetworking, or CDI) is the technology for interconnecting contentnetworks. The CDI model allows for interconnecting various ContentNetworks. The internetworking task requires request routing andcontent distribution protocols. This document investigates thesecurity risks and threats associated with the contentinternetworking. Proposed remedies are viewed not as designrecommendations but more as illustrations of the nature of threats.
